problem_text_cn: 如图,AB、AC是⊙O的两条切线,切点分别为B、C,D是优弧⁀{BC}上的一点,已知∠BAC=80°,那么∠BDC=()度．
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB and AC are the two tangents of ⊙O. The tangent points are B and C respectively. D is a point on the major arc ⁀BC. It is known that ∠BAC = N_0, then ∠BDC = () degrees.
raw_answer: 解:连接BO,CO,∵AB、AC是⊙O的两条切线,切点分别为B、C,∴∠ABO=∠ACO=90°,∵∠BAC=80°,∴∠BOC=100°,∴∠BDC=50°．故选:A．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了切线的性质以及圆周角定理以及四边形内角和定理,得出∠BOC的度数是解题关键．
